Approximates a given state using an Average.

AveragerRef DiscretizationAverager::create ( int  resolutionfactor,
const StateVariables &  scale 
) [static]

Creates a new DiscretizationAverager.

Parameters:
resolutionfactor Controls the spacing of the uniform grid used as the basis set
scale The weights used to obtain the scaled Euclidean space. Unused dimensions are set to 0 in the basis vectors.

Definition at line 399 of file averager.cc.

References DiscretizationAverager().

const StateVariables & DiscretizationAverager::dimensions (  )  const [virtual]

Specifies the importance of each state dimension to this Averager.

Returns:
A mapping whose keys comprise all the state dimensions that this Averager uses in its approximation. The data give the scaling coefficient for each of these dimensions.

Implements Averager.

Member Data Documentation

QueryContainer DiscretizationAverager::m_queries [private]

Invariant: contains all the existing DiscretizationAverages that this DiscretizationAverager has created.

The keys include both bases and queries, so the data pointer may be NULL.
